original_text: And ye shall overthrow their altars, and break their pillars, and burn their groves with fire; and ye shall hew down the graven images of their gods, and destroy the names of them out of that place.
korean_text: 그 제단을 헐며 주상을 깨뜨리며 아세라 상을 불사르고 또 그 조각한 신상들을 찍어 그 이름을 그 곳에서 멸하라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall overthrow their altars,
and burn their groves with fire;
and ye shall hew down the graven images of their gods,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들의 신들의 새긴 형상을 찍고,

sentences.original_text: and destroy the names of them
